casebody.data:
Gary Warren SPRUILL
v.
WESTFIELD INSURANCE COMPANY, Allstate Property and Casualty Insurance Company No. 5P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2017 Heather G. Connor, Attorney at Law, Jeffrey B. Kuykendal, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Carson W. Johnson, Attorney at Law, for Westfield Insurance Company. L. Phillip Hornthal, III, Attorney at Law, L.P. Hornthal, Jr., Elizabeth City, Attorney at Law, for Spruill, Gary Warren. Kevin N. Lewis, Attorney at Law, Ahoskie, for Allstate Property and Casualty Insurance Company.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 5th of January 2017 by Defendant (Westfield Insurance Company) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."
